title: 3 Ways to Reset an Xfinity Remote Control

steps.title: Press and hold the i button.
steps.content: Press and hold the i button. It's on the right side of the remote below an asterisk symbol.

steps.title: Press and hold the Home button.
steps.content: Press and hold the Home button. You'll see it with the icon of a house next to the microphone button near the middle of the remote.

steps.title: Hold for 5 seconds.
steps.content: Hold for 5 seconds. Keep i and the Home button pressed for about five seconds. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Release the buttons when the status light blinks.
steps.content: Release the buttons when the status light blinks. The status light is near the top of the remote between the Power and TV Input buttons.

steps.title: Press the Power button.
steps.content: Press the Power button. It's in the top right corner of your remote.

steps.title: Press the Last button.
steps.content: Press the Last button. The Last button looks like an arrow pointing backward that is to the left of the microphone button. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Press the Volume down button.
steps.content: Press the Volume down button. You'll see this button near the top-left of your remote, and below a + icon. Once you've pressed this sequence of buttons, you'll complete the reset process and can Pair it . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Press and hold the A button (it also looks like a triangle).
steps.content: Press and hold the A button (it also looks like a triangle). Keep it pressed while you move to the next step.

steps.title: Press and hold the D button (it also looks like a diamond).
steps.content: Press and hold the D button (it also looks like a diamond). These buttons are near the middle of your remote and around a navigational pad.

steps.title: Hold for 5 seconds.
steps.content: Hold for 5 seconds. Keep A and D pressed for about five seconds.

steps.title: Release the buttons when the status light on your remote changes from red to green.
steps.content: Release the buttons when the status light on your remote changes from red to green. You'll see the status LED near the top of the remote. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Press 9+8+1.
steps.content: Press 9 + 8 + 1 . This completes the reset process and you can pair it . [5] X Research source

steps.title: Press and hold the Setup button until the light changes from red to green.
steps.content: Press and hold the Setup button until the light changes from red to green. The status light is at the very top of the remote and the Setup button is at the very bottom, to the left. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Press 9+8+1.
steps.content: Press 9 + 8 + 1 . The status LED will blink green twice to indicate the remote was successfully reset. [7] X Research source
